history.proof: intros x y u. unfold prod_scal, prod_plus. simpl. scongruence use: @scal_distr_r unfold: snd, ModuleSpace.sort, fst.

original: intros x y u. unfold prod_scal, prod_plus. simpl. rewrite ModuleSpace.ax4. rewrite ModuleSpace.ax4. rewrite ModuleSpace.ax1. rewrite prod_scal_assoc. rewrite prod_scal_assoc. rewrite (prod_scal_distr_l x). rewrite (prod_scal_distr_l y). reflexivity.
